description: Provides the status of all clusters visible to this Amazon Web Services account. Allows you to filter the list of clusters based on certain criteria; for example, filtering by cluster creation date and time or by status. This call returns a maximum of 50 clusters in unsorted order per call, but returns a marker to track the paging of the cluster list across multiple ListClusters calls.

parameters.name: ClusterStates
parameters.description: The cluster state filters to apply when listing clusters. Clusters that change state while this action runs may be not be returned as expected in the list of clusters. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Clusters
nested_items.description: The list of clusters for the account based on the given filters.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the cluster.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the cluster.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the cluster.

nested_items.name: StateChangeReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the cluster status change.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The programmatic code for the state change reason.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The descriptive message for the state change reason.

nested_items.name: CreationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time of the cluster.

nested_items.name: ReadyDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the cluster was ready to run steps.

nested_items.name: EndDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the cluster was terminated.

nested_items.name: ErrorDetails
nested_items.description: A list of tuples that provides information about the errors that caused a cluster to terminate. This structure can contain up to 10 different ErrorDetail tuples.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The name or code associated with the error.

nested_items.name: ErrorData
nested_items.description: A list of key value pairs that provides contextual information about why an error occured.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A message that describes the error.

nested_items.name: NormalizedInstanceHours
nested_items.description: An approximation of the cost of the cluster, represented in m1.small/hours. This value is incremented one time for every hour an m1.small instance runs. Larger instances are weighted more, so an Amazon EC2 instance that is roughly four times more expensive would result in the normalized instance hours being incremented by four. This result is only an approximation and does not reflect the actual billing rate.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the cluster.

nested_items.name: OutpostArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Outpost where the cluster is launched.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: The pagination token that indicates the next set of results to retrieve.
